knimeNode.name: Multiple Selection Input QuickForm (Comp.)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Allows selecting multiple values from a list of String which is returned as a data table and String flow variable.

intro.p: Allows selecting multiple values from a list of String which is returned as a data table and String flow variable. The value can also be controlled from a QuickForm (KNIME WebPortal).

fullDescription.option: A descriptive label that will be shown in, for instance the web port.
Some lines of description that will be shown in the remote control form, for instance by means of a tooltip.

A weight value that influences the position of the component in the final layout. Lighter elements will be placed at the top, whereas heavier items will be placed nearer the bottom. The value is relative to the weights of the other components in the workflow (absolute value is not relevant, only the relative comparison to other elements).
A list if values (comma separated) that are selected by default.
A list of values (comma separated) that are shown as Check Boxes.
Layout components Check Box (vertical) and Check Box (horizontal) to display the multiple selection in the meta node config and as QuickForm element.

ports.outPort: Table output holding the selected choices in one column with the Variable Name as column name.
